page.title: 04WHY I LIVE IN BAD'HAM/DENNTN
page.content: Work was the main reason for living in Badingham & Dennington. Next came housing - the availability of a suitable house or land, the reasonable cost or a liking for a particular house. For many the village was their birthplace or they were country born. Others came to be near family or friends. Some chose the villages because of the rural aspect & environment, the quiet, their preference for village life or to be in the catchment area of a particular school. A few came to escape from London; because they liked East Anglia; were relatively near to Ipswich or were close to their leisure pursuits. For one Dennington resident the proximity of shops & a bus service was the deciding factor.
